name: create
description: Create a table with specified columns.

table_name.description: The name of the table to create.

columns.description: A list of column definitions, e.g., ['id INT PRIMARY KEY', 'name VARCHAR(255)'].

properties.description: str: The constructed SQL CREATE query.

name: delete
description: Delete rows from a table based on given conditions.

table_name.description: The name of the table to delete from.

conditions.description: A list of conditions in the form: [{'operator': 'AND', 'left': 'column_name', 'sign': '=', 'right': 'value'}]. Operators can be AND, OR. Signs can be =, !=, <, >, <=, >=.

properties.description: str: The constructed SQL DELETE query.

name: insert
description: Insert rows of data into a table with specified columns.

table_name.description: The name of the table to insert into.

columns.description: A list of column names for the INSERT operation.

values.description: A list of rows, where each row is a list of values to insert.

properties.description: str: The constructed SQL INSERT query.

name: select
description: Select rows from a table with specified columns and conditions.

table_name.description: The name of a table to query.

columns.description: A list of column names to select. If * is given, all columns are selected.

conditions.description: A list of conditions in the form: [{'operator': 'AND', 'left': 'column_name', 'sign': '=', 'right': 'value'}]. Operators can be AND, OR. Signs can be =, !=, <, >, <=, >=.

order_by.description: A list of columns to order the result by.

desc.description: If order_by is specified, this flag indicates whether to sort in descending order. Default is False.

limit.description: The maximum number of rows to return.

top.description: The maximum number of rows to return.

join.description: A dictionary containing the join_type, table_name, and join_condition. Join types can be INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL, CROSS, NATURAL. Join conditions are in the form: 'table1.column1 = table2.column2'.

group_by.description: The column to group the results by.

properties.description: str: The constructed SQL SELECT query.

name: update
description: Update rows in a table with specified columns and values.

table_name.description: The name of the table to update.

columns.description: A list of column names to update.

values.description: A list of corresponding values to update.

conditions.description: A list of conditions in the form: [{'operator': 'AND', 'left': 'column_name', 'sign': '=', 'right': 'value'}]. Operators can be AND, OR. Signs can be =, !=, <, >, <=, >=.

properties.description: str: The constructed SQL UPDATE query.
